bill_title: Commending and honoring the Alcester-Hudson Cubs football team on an outstanding season in 2014.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring the Alcester-Hudson Cubs football team on an outstanding season in 2014. WHEREAS, the Alcester-Hudson Cubs football team finished the 2014 season with a record of 10-1, losing only to the eventual state champion, Howard, and advanced to the state semifinals in Class 9A for the first time in school history; and WHEREAS, the Cubs had seven players selected to the Tri-Valley All Conference Team; and three Cubs players, Colin Walth, Lyle LaFramboise, and Grant Johnson, were selected to the Class 9A All State Team; and WHEREAS, the Cubs set numerous school records during the 2014 season and head coach, Brian Haak, was named the Region 5 Coach of the Year by his colleagues: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninetieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the South Dakota Legislature congratulates and honors the Alcester-Hudson Cubs football team, along with their cheerleaders, support personnel, and coaches on an outstanding season, and wishes them every success in future endeavors on and off the athletic field of competition.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring the Alcester-Hudson Cubs football team on an outstanding season in 2014. WHEREAS, the Alcester-Hudson Cubs football team finished the 2014 season with a record of 10-1, losing only to the eventual state champion, Howard, and advanced to the state semifinals in Class 9A for the first time in school history; and WHEREAS, the Cubs had seven players selected to the Tri-Valley All Conference Team; and three Cubs players, Colin Walth, Lyle LaFramboise, and Grant Johnson, were selected to the Class 9A All State Team; and WHEREAS, the Cubs set numerous school records during the 2014 season and head coach, Brian Haak, was named the Region 5 Coach of the Year by his colleagues: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninetieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the South Dakota Legislature congratulates and honors the Alcester-Hudson Cubs football team, along with their cheerleaders, support personnel, and coaches on an outstanding season, and wishes them every success in future endeavors on and off the athletic field of competition. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
